taskman.backend.constraint

Class Constraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • taskman.backend.constraint.Constraint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConstraintComponent

    public class Constraint
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConstraintComponent
    Class representing a constraint. (This is the leaf component) Note: We apply here the Composite Pattern
    Author:
    Jeroen Van Der Donckt
